column3: str
Hancock seems to be quite pleased with himself.
Speak with Hancock.
Speak with Alphinaud.
Follow Hancock.
Speak with Hancock.
Speak with Alphinaud.
So that building's filled with Garleans...
Some might deem it unwise to loiter outside the gates of the consulate of a hostile empire.
Danger, excitement. Intrigue! Oh, my!
Compared to the Hingan architecture, this is drab and uninspired. Or perhaps I've had my fill of Garlean aesthetics, such as they are.
There is oh so much more I could speak of─the soothing waters of the onsen, the ephemeral delights of the pleasure district─but you are doubtless still weary from your long sea voyage.
Let us retire to the company offices.
Even though this feels just as out of place as the Garlean Consulate, it's a lot more...comforting.
...There is no denying that this place was built for an Ul'dahn.
Ahhh, the unmistakable scent of wealth and power...
(I daresay we could travel to Meracydia or the New World and find a man like Hancock waiting for us.)
Greetings, sirs and ladies, and welcome to the Kugane branch offices of the East Aldenard Trading Company.
At long last, we arrive at our destination. May I present to you our humble offices.
We have much to discuss, so I will refrain from further prattle. Come, come, right this way!
I'm not sure how I imagined our time in the Far East unfolding, but it definitely didn't involve Ul'dahns. And especially not <Emphasis>these</Emphasis> Ul'dahns. Still...whatever works, right?
He was not exaggerating when he spoke of their wards' efficacy. Whoever wove them did so with consummate skill...
Oh, this place takes me back! It reminds me of the workshop of an Ul'dahn lapidary I once served!
I must confess, I am an avid collector of all things Far Eastern. See for yourself. I insist!
Though I am reluctant to take any action whatsoever that could be construed as placing ourselves in Lord Lolorito's debt...we must avail ourselves of what means are available.
Our Ala Mhigan allies placed their faith in us, and I do not intend to disappoint them...
The Scions are always welcome here. Shall I show you inside?
